changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE GENRE_FILM( genre_id integer NOT NULL, film_id integer NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (actor_id, film_id), CONSTRAINT fk_genre FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) references DIRECTORS (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_film FOREIGN KEY (film_id) references FILMS (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE );
